name: sturdy

effect.sun-moon: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Does not prevent regular KOs from full HP.

short_effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
